name: Papa-Rassi
description:
The life of a super star can be a hassle, especially when you are always followed by paparazzis.

In this game you're gonna play as MacDonna, Cannot Reeves, Stevie FindOut or Taylor Slow and you're going to compete against your celebrities friends to escape the paparazzis for as long as you can. 

This is a 4 player 2D free-for-all game in which each player takes control of a bootleg star and must survive as long as possible from hordes of paparazzis by avoiding them at all costs and attracting them to the other stars.

More over, Papa-Rassi can be played with the PUSH SENSERS, a connected object developped by Moogle ! All the players share 2 Push Sensers, a pink one and a black one, and they have to answer to the FAKE NEWZ with it !

Game made by Supuun Gang 
In Partnership with OUBISOFT Studio and Moogle

Team composed of :
